title: Met requirements, but didnt get free icon
body:
I played, I won, the 5 premade thing. I haven't been banned or restricted as far as I can remember (since first started to play). I got the free champ part but not the icon, why did I get it? I was on holiday for a while (4 days). did I just not get it for x reason or not get it because I was away?

(Friend said he had it just appear, he didn't have to go to store or anything)
